fxInfo_citation: Pemstein et al. (2018, V-Dem Working Paper Series 2018:21); V-Dem Codebook (see suggested citation at the top of this document).
fxInfo_clarification: This does not apply to parties that are barred from competing for failing to meet registration requirements or support thresholds.
fxInfo_cross_coder_aggregation: Bayesian Item Response Theory Measurement Model
fxInfo_ordering: If your answer is 4, skip the next question [v2psbantar].

fxInfo_responses.value: Yes. All parties except the state-sponsored party (and closely allied parties) are banned.
Yes. Elections are non-partisan or there are no officially recognized parties.
Yes. But only a few parties are banned.
No. No parties are officially banned.

fxInfo_scale: Ordinal, converted to interval by the measurement model
name: v2psparban, *_osp, *_ord
